attributes.description:
This scarce and well looked after Mercedes E500 carries a 5.5 litre V8 with a mean punch 285kW and 530Nm of torque propelling the 1715kg luxury coupe via a seven speed 7G-TRONIC transmission, 100km/h is reached from standstill in just 5.4 seconds. Fuel consumption of 10.9L/100km is quoted for mixed cycle running.The COMMAND APS multimedia system combines navigation, audio and telephone functions, displaying information on a 7 inch colour display. The central controller adds to the numerous operating possibilities available on the multifunction steering wheel.
E&OE

DONT MISS OUT ON THIS DEAL
TEST DRIVES WELCOME

We are based in CAPE TOWN (22 Section Street, Unit 1B, North Gate Park, Paarden Eiland) - Opposite North Gate Estate

We offer Finance through all major banks and trade ins are considered.

attributes.description:
Experience the legacy of Toyota Gazoo racing when you get behind the wheel of the all-new Corolla Cross GR-Sport. Its specially tuned GR-S suspension delivers sharper steering, better handling and braking forÂ more stability during extreme cornering so you can cross boundaries on every adventure.

This 2022 Toyota Corolla Cross with only 159 km is packed with extras such as:
- LED headlights 
- Black leather sports seats 
- Contrasting red stitching throughout the interior 
- 18 inch rims 
- Cruise control 
- Voice control 
- Dual zone climate control 
- Bluetooth connectivity 
- Automatic folding mirrors
- Black roof rails 
- Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
- Lane keep assist
- Blind spot assist 
- PDC front & rear
- Automotive high beam assist and much more
